thread.title: Sanders Plans Major Speech To Explain Democratic Socialism
thread.title_full: Sanders Plans Major Speech To Explain Democratic Socialism

author: Heather
title: Sanders Plans Major Speech To Explain Democratic Socialism
text:
sharethis 10/19/15 7:00am IOWA CITY, Iowa — Acknowledging the political liability of the word "socialist," Bernie Sanders said Sunday that he plans a "major speech" to detail what it means when he calls himself a 'democratic socialist.' Responding to a woman at a house party who asked him how he'd counter Republican attacks about calling himself a socialist, the… 2016 Democratic primary , Bernie Sanders , Democratic socialism Comments
